::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus' eyes widen slightly as a gigantic creature walks up to 
Reptilica and sniffs him. What in the pit was that? And what was it 
doing in Alliance territory?

He glances down at his comp, seeing scanning results. It was a bot 
allright. A bot that could be used fairly well...

"DevilDuer," he says into his comm-link, "Please report to the base 
entrance, prefferebly with your stun gun charged on maximum."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer stops in the hallway, hearing Zardus' transmission. He
looks 
at Scorpina.

"Lets go to the entrance. I think Zardus is there," he says, setting 
his stun gun on charge as he turns around, heading for the entrance
of 
the base.
